Location.Description: This is your home.

Location.Description: You see a fountain.

Location.Name: Alchemist's Hut
Location.Description: There are many strange plants on the shelves.

Location.Name: Alchemist's Garden
Location.Description: Many plants are growing here.

Location.Name: Farmhouse
Location.Description: There is a small farmhouse, with a farmer in front.

Location.Name: Farmer's Field
Location.Description: You see rows of vegetables growing here.

Location.Name: Guard Post
Location.Description: There is a large, tough-looking guard here.

Location.Name: Bridge
Location.Description: A stone bridge crosses a wide river

Location.Name: Forest
Location.Description: You see spider webs covering the trees in this forest.

Location.Name: Lair of the Spider Queen
Location.Description: You see webs covering the room and skeletons riddled across the floor.

Location.Name: Winding Path
Location.Description: A calm winding path through the forest.

Location.Name: Forest Clearing
Location.Description: You see animals scurry away

Location.Name: Dryad Shack
Location.Description: You see a small abode made out of living trees. A dryad sits calmly inside.

Location.Name: Abandoned Campground
Location.Description: You see empty tents and a fire with a small pot over it

Location.Name: Corrupted Forest
Location.Description: You see mangey animals wandering around. Some stare at you.

Location.Name: Elemental Clearing
Location.Description: You see living beings made of rock and water. The air tingles with elemental energy.

Location.Name: Mountain Path
Location.Description: A winding path on the mountain. You feel hints of corruption around you. As you approach the summit the air becomes thick and unbearable.

Location.Name: Mountain Peak
Location.Description: You see clouds underneath you all the way to the horizon.

Location.Name: Perch of the Bird God
Location.Description: You see a large bird in a throne-like nest surrounded by other smaller birds. He offers you a quest to assist his flock.

Location.Name: Overlook
Location.Description: You see a beautiful view over the side of the mountains. A river flows gently and bird and animals are roaming the land. It is serene.

Location.Name: Mountain Path
Location.Description: A winding path on the mountain. You see a ravine at the end of the path.

Location.Name: Den of the Alpha
Location.Description: The den is dark and has no way to escape. You see two glowing red eyes staring at you from the darkness. Is this the end?
